text:
Field Nation | Director of Software Engineering | Minneapolis,MN | On-site, Full-time

We offer a web-based marketplace platform for buyers and sellers of contract services to simply connect, work, and manage their business.

The Director of Software Engineering will have the opportunity to support and impact Field Nationâ€™s development team by providing mentorship, career development, and technical leadership in collaboration with the CTO. With a strong focus on people and the business, this person will enable our teams to move quicker by focusing on the execution of our overall strategy and product delivery process.
